name: Battle Deck Energy: Premature Release
description:
A single-player deck-builder about battling waves of bullies and recovering your self-confidence.

Download the game for smoother performance and fire shaders!

How to Play:

Click and drag cards with the mouse.
Cards go onto spaces matching their type (ie. Attack, Defend, Skill).
Playing a card spends the Battle Deck Energy cost of that card.
Battle Deck Energy refreshes every round.
When given the option, double-click cards to add or remove them.
'M' mutes the music during the campaign.

Github:  https://github.com/Maaack/Battle-Deck-Energy
